ayas.translation: By the fig and the olive,
And by this land made safe;

ayas.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
ayas.translation: Surely We created man of the best stature
Then we reduced him to the lowest of the low,

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
ayas.translation: Save those who believe and do good works, and theirs is a reward unfailing.
ayas.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti falahum ajrun ghayru mamnūn

ayas.translation: So who henceforth will give the lie to thee about the judgment?
Is not Allah the most conclusive of all judges?
